name: Code One Dispatch
overview:
Code One Dispatch is a racing game with emergency vehicles such as a police car, fire truck and ambulance, with similar over-the-top gameplay as Crazy Taxi.

Players can choose a vehicle from police car, bio hazard semi truck, fire engine, limousine, ambulance and undercover police car, with a helicopter and tank as extra unlockable vehicles. The mission depends on which vehicle was selected. The ambulance has to take someone from a traffic accident in a car crash to the hospital. The semi truck has rush to a tanker truck that spilled chemical waste to quarantine the waste. The helicopter has to fly over the road to a sail boat where someone fell overboard in a storm and rescue the survivors. and similar missions for each of the vehicles. Each vehicle has a separate high score list.

The game is silly and over the top, with big jumps, racing through a shopping mall, drive on underground trains track, jumping from a yacht to the harbour and at one point even fighting a Godzilla monster to save the city. The player can crash into other cars which sends them flying, drive through bridge pillars and street lamps. There is a property damage counter with a dollar sign, that keeps track of the amount of damage the player has caused throughout the race.
